Parameters: The Drawable to use for the checkmark.
setCheckMarkDrawable(int).Description: Set the checkmark to a given Drawable, identified by its resourece id. This will be drawn when @B_android#widget#CheckedTextView#isChecked_E@ is true.

TintCheckedTextView(android.content.Cont.FullName: public TintCheckedTextView (Context context, AttributeSet attrs, int defStyleAttr)

ClassDesc: An tint aware @B_android#widget#CheckedTextView_E@. This will automatically be used when you use @B_android#widget#CheckedTextView_E@ in your layouts. You should only need to manually use this class when writing custom views.
